FuncDef:
The value-added-service daa report-dropped-flow enable command enables a device to report statistics about dropped DAA service traffic.
The undo value-added-service daa report-dropped-flow enable command disables a device from reporting statistics about dropped DAA service traffic.
By default, a device is disabled from reporting statistics about dropped DAA service traffic.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable a device to report statistics about dropped DAA service traffic, run the value-added-service daa report-dropped-flow enable command. You can then run the display value-added-service user daa with-dropped-flow command to check the DAA users with dropped traffic. Based on the DAA user information, you can determine the user terminals from which traffic is dropped.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
